title: Bandwidth: Sony set to unveil new subscription service while GeForce Now adds new exclusives
content:
It looks like Sony is chomping at the bit to add a new subscription service to compete with Xbox’s Game Pass. To add, GeForce Now is offering up a lot this week with a few new games, Fortnite‘s newest season, and some pretty exclusive new in-game quests.

more…

The post Bandwidth: Sony set to unveil new subscription service while GeForce Now adds new exclusives appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: This has been yet another quite week for cloud-based gaming. GeForce Now is adding a few new games an exclusives for members.
